sub_topic: Probability of winning a game of chance
message_1: Suppose you have a spinner with six equal sections numbered 1 through 6, and you need to guess which number the spinner will land on. If you guess correctly, you win the game. What is the probability of winning the game on one spin?
message_2: The probability of winning the game on one spin is 1/6, since there are six equally likely outcomes and only one of them corresponds to a correct guess.
